title: "Basic notebook: calculating fold change"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
# Step 1. Setup matrix
mat <- matrix(sample(1:500, 50, replace = TRUE), nrow = 5)

colnames(mat) <- c("cond1", "cond2", "cond3", "cond4", "cond5", "ctrl1", "ctrl2", "ctrl3", "ctrl4", "ctrl5")
rownames(mat) <- c("gene1", "gene2", "gene3", "gene4", "gene5")

mat

# Step 2. Calculate fold change by gene
cond_average <- rowMeans(mat[, 1:5])
ctrl_average <- rowMeans(mat[, 6:10])

fold_change <- cond_average / ctrl_average
fold_change
```
